ingredients: 3-4 lbs beef bones (marrow bones, knuckles, oxtail) or chicken feet
2 tbsp apple cider vinegar (critical for extracting collagen)
steps: Optional but recommended: Roast bones/vegetables at 400Â°F for 30-40 minutes until browned for deeper flavor
Add all ingredients to Instant Pot. Fill with water to max fill line (do not exceed)
Close lid, set valve to sealing
Cook on high pressure: - Chicken broth: 45 minutes - Vegetable broth: 30 minutes - Bone broth: 120 minutes (2 hours)
Natural release for 15-20 minutes, then quick release remaining pressure
Strain through fine mesh strainer or cheesecloth. Press solids to extract all liquid
Let cool, then refrigerate. Skim fat layer from top once chilled (save for cooking)
Store in refrigerator for up to 5 days, or freeze in portions for up to 6 months
title: Instant Pot Broth
